result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Arias, Mikol D.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

[ma] Case called at 3:23 PM 
Defendant Mikol D. Arias in court.  Attorney Jeffrey Jacob De La Rosa in court for Mikol D. Arias.  Attorney Monica Hall in court for State of Wisconsin. 
DA Hall verifies victim rights compliance. 

Atty De La Rosa requests an additional status be scheduled. 

Scheduling is discussed. 
recess: 3:25pm 
NEXT: Status on 12/16/22 at 3:00pm

Pre-trial conference on October 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on November 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

[MK] case called at 10:52am
Defendant Mikol D. Arias in court with Attorney Jeffrey De La Rosa.  DA Monica Hall in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Mr. Arias waives his right to Preliminary Hearing; the Court accepts this waiver and binds him over for Trial.

Arraignment:
--service of Information admitted, reading waived
--the charges and maximum penalties are recited
--pleas of "not guilty" are entered
--in response to the Court's inquiry, both counsel indicate they are not requesting speedy trial.
recess 10:57am 
[post hearing: Mr. Arias verifies that the 10619 N County Line Rd Lot #56 address remains current] 

NEXT:   (1) Pretrial Conference on October 19th at 8:30am,  (2) Status Conference on November 1st at 2:30pm

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on September 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Mikol D. Arias
Current: 10619 N County Line Rd Lot#56, Whitewater, WI 53190 United States  (Effective: 08-03-2022)
Prior: 10619 N. County Line Rd., Lot #56, Whitewater, WI 53190 United States

[MK] case called at 1:46pm 
Defendant Mikol D. Arias appears via videoconferencing from the Jefferson County Jail, in custody, along with Public Defender Jeffrey De La Rosa (the PD will appoint counsel).  Public Service Special Prosecutor Melanie Flint appears for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney De La Rosa agrees that the video-connection is sight and sound sufficient. 

The Defendant verifies that the date of birth and address listed on the Criminal Complaint are correct; Lot #56 is added to the address. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charges and maximum penalties are recited.
Preliminary Hearing time limit is waived by both parties.

The Court requires a $1,200 Signature Bond with conditions:
--not to commit any acts or threats of violence
--no contact with the Victim 
--to maintain absolute sobriety 
recess 1:53pm. 

NEXT: (1) clerk- please add the PD Office to the mailing matrix,  (2) Preliminary Hearing on September 8th at 9:30am
